info.title: Workmate APIs
info.description: A set of powerful work force management APIs which helps the user to get all the data related to their organizations such as live location employees, client details and task details etc. These workforce management APIs are powered by MapmyIndia's own Map, IoT and workmate platform. MapmyIndia Workmate easily integrates into existing cloud services via our workforce management APIs. These APIs helps to improve the organizational effiency by providing location intellegence to employees.

get.summary: To get all the user details which belongs to your organization.
get.description: Gives all the users details of your organization. Using this API, you will be able to identify the workmate user id, workplace location, employee Id and other important details related to user profile. You can only get the list of users who belongs to your organization.

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: API version should be mentioned in the header along with bearer Token. Available version is v1.0, Default version is v1.0

parameters.name: workPlace
parameters.description: Send true if you want to get the work place location details

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: send the user Ids in comma separated format to get the list of selected user details. If it is not passed all the user details will be fetched.

204.description: content not found. Check your input values.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID supplied or invalid data type.

401.description: Unauthorized Request. Access to API is forbidden.

403.description: User type is Field user. Only manager and admin type user have the access to this API

get.summary: To get all your client details
get.description: Get all your client details which comes under your organization. Using this API you will be able to identify the client's unique id, name, address,lat,long, and the cotanct person details. Also, you can get client's department details belong to the client.

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: API version should be mentioned in the header along with bearer Token. Available version is v1.0, Default version is v1.0

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: EPOCH time stamp in local time. Records will be fetched from this start time.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: EPOCH time stamp in local time. Records will be fetched till this end time.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user. Once it is mentioned, only client created by this user will be displayed.

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the client. To get the details about only the mentioned client.

204.description: Content not available for the selected period.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID supplied or invalid data type.

401.description: Unauthorized Request. Access to API is forbidden.

403.description: User type is Field user. Only manager and admin type user have the access to this API

post.description: Create Client API allows you to add a new client into your organization. Using this API, You can create a new client with a name, address, lat,long, contact details, Department along with their contact details.

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: API version should be mentioned in the header along with bearer Token. Available version is v1.0, Default version is v1.0

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID supplied or invalid data type.

401.description: Unauthorized Request. Access to API is forbidden.

403.description: User type is Field user. Only manager and admin type user have the access to this API

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: Header for this API. Available values are v1.0, Default value is v1.0

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Enter the start time for the select period. It is in Epoch Time.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: Enter the end time for the select period. It is in EPOCH Time.

parameters.name: ownerId
parameters.description: Unqiue Id of the the user who has created this task.

parameters.name: assigneeId
parameters.description: Unique Id of the user who performs this task.

parameters.name: clientDetails
parameters.description: To get client location details for the task.

parameters.name: activityDetails
parameters.description: To get Activity details against the task.

204.description: Content Not available for the selected period.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID supplied or invalid data type.

401.description: Unauthorized Request. Access to API is forbidden.

403.description: User type is Field user. Only manager and admin type user have the access to this API

get.description: Get indivudual users location data which includes address, time, speed, phones's battery level.

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: API version should be mentioned in the header along with bearer Token. Available version is v1.0, Default version is v1.0

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time of the report. At a time maximum of 31 days can data can be fetched together. Time in epoch time.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: Start time of the report. At a time maximum of 31 days can data can be fetched together. Time in epoch time.

204.description: Content Not available for the selected period.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID supplied or invalid data type.

401.description: Unauthorized Request. Access to API is forbidden.

403.description: User type is Field user. Only manager and admin type user have the access to this API

get.summary: To get the form's Id and their details from your account.
get.description: It gives all the forms which is being created under your account. using this API you can get the unique Ids of differnt form and it can be used in custom form data API.

parameters.name: apiVersion

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID supplied or invalid data type.

401.description: Unauthorized Request. Access to API is forbidden.

403.description: User type is Field user. Only manager and admin type user have the access to this API

get.summary: To get form based check in/out details
get.description: Get the complete detail about the check in/check out activity against the particular form. Get the form Id from the custom form API.

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: API version should be mentioned in the header along with bearer Token. Available version is v1.0, Default version is v1.0

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the Form. It can be fetched from company setting forms API.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time of the report. At a time maximum of 31 days can data can be fetched together. Time in epoch time.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: Start time of the report. At a time maximum of 31 days can data can be fetched together. Time in epoch time.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user.

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the client.

403.description: User type is Field user. Only manager and admin type user have the access to this API

get.summary: Get users attendance details with travelled distance.

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: API version should be mentioned in the header along with bearer Token. Available version is v1.0, Default version is v1.0

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID supplied or invalid data type.

401.description: Unauthorized Request. Access to API is forbidden.

403.description: User type is Field user. Only manager and admin ser type user has the access to this API.

id.description: Unqiue workmate Id of the user

emailId.description: Unique email Id of the user. This will be used to login to workmate account.

status.description: It gives users active or inactive status . 1 - Active user, 0- Inactive user.

type.description: Three user type is there in workmate. 0 -admin, 1 -manager, 2 - field user

creationTime.description: Time at which user is being created over workmate. It is an Local EPCH time.

workplaceId.description: Unique Id of the Work place.

costFactor.description: per km travelled cost. It will be multiplyed against distance travelled by the user.

employeeId.description: Employee unquie ID based on the company record

branchName.description: Users branch name of the work place.

branchCode.description: Users branch code of the work place.

id.description: Unique ID of the client or Customer

name.description: Name of the client or customer

address.description: Location address of the client or customer.

contactPersonName.description: Contact person name of client or customer location

emailId.description: Client or Customer contact email id.

mobileNo.description: Client or Customer contact mobile number

userId.description: The Id of the user who created this client or customer

userName.description: Name of the user who has created this client.

typeId.description: Unqiue ID of the client type/category.

creationTime.description: Client creatation time in Local Epoch Time stamp.

updationTime.description: Last updated time against the client in Epoch Time.

creationTimeStr.description: Client creation time in string format

updationTimeStr.description: Client updation time in string format

departments.description: Details of Departments associated with the clients

Status.description: Last activity done by the user. 3- check in , 4- check out, 5- client created.

time.description: Time at which last activity is being carried out in EPOCH Time.

visitedUserId.description: Unique ID of the user who has done the last activity against this client.

vistedUserName.description: Name of the user who has done the last activity aginst this client.

clientName.description: Name of the client or customer location

contactPersonName.description: Clients or customers Contact person name

emailId.description: Clients or Customers contact email id.

mobileNo.description: Client or Customer contact mobile number

typeId.description: Customer or client category based on your compnay details

viewRight.description: Clients view right to the users. 0-public , 1-team , 2-manager

departments.description: Departments details associated with the clients

description.example: Collect documents like PAN Card, Passport and the application form.

ownerId.description: Unique user Id of the Task owner. The user who created this task

status.description: Indicates the current status of the task like 1- unassigned, 2- assigned, 3- read, 4- work in progress, 5- overdue, 6- completed, 7- completed early, 8- completed later, 9- manually closed.

creationDate.description: Date in which the task is created. It is in EPOCH time.

dueDate.description: Due date of the task. Task should be completed on or before this date. It is in EPOCH time.

assigneeId.description: Unique id of the user who is going to perform this task.

clientId.description: Unique Id of the client. The task should be perfomed at this locaton. It is a Task location.

updationDate.description: Last activity time against this task.

departmentId.description: Unique ID of the Department where task need to be done.

checkinId.description: Unique Id of the check in activity against this task

clientName.description: Name of the client. The task should be perfomed at this client lcoation.

departmentName.description: Department Name of the client. The task should be perfomed at this client department lcoation.

asigneeName.description: Name of the assinee. who is going to perform this task.

taskListId.description: Unique Id number of the task lis

lat.description: Latitude value of the task location

long.description: Longitude value of the task location

personName.description: Either client or department Contact person name

emailId.description: Either client or department contact person email id.

mobileNo.description: Either client or department contact contact mobile number

lat.description: Latitude value of the check in location

long.description: Longitude value of the check in location

time.description: Check in time, in Epoch Timestamp

lat.description: Latitude value of the check in location

long.description: Longitude value of the check in location

time.description: Check in time, in Epoch Timestamp

address.description: Users location address for the given time.
address.example: 40/2, Kalasipalyam, Bengaluru, Karnataka. 18 m from MP Auto Consultancy pin- 560002 (India)

distance.description: Total travelled distance from start time to this location time period.It is in kilometer.

driftStatus.description: Based on the GPS drift this location data is accepted or rejected will be stated. 1 - accepted, 0 - rejected.

heading.description: GPS angle. It gives the direction of the user.

speed.description: Speed of user at that time. It is a GPS speed.It is in Km/hr

movementStatus.description: Stopped or moving status will be there for the user.

gpsTime.description: GPS time in epochtime stamp. It is the time at which location is being collected from the mobile phone.

insertTime.description: Time at which location packet is being received at the server end. It is normally called as GPRS time. it is in EPOCH time format.

workStartTime.description: Time at which work is being started in Epoch Time.

workEndTime.description: Time at which work is being started in Epoch Time.

workEndRemark.description: Remarks entered by the user while concluding the work.

workStartRemark.description: emarks entered by the user while starting the work.
workStartRemark.example: Starting my work from client location.

workEndAddress.description: Location at which work is being concluded

workStartAddress.description: Location at which work is being concluded

workEndLatitude.description: Latitude value of Work end location

workEndLongitude.description: Longitude value of Work end location

workStartLatitude.description: Longitude value of Work Start location

workStartLongitude.description: Longitude value of Work Start location

costFactor.description: Per km travelled cost. It will be multiplyed against distance travelled by the user.

distance.description: Total travel distance between work start to work end activity. It is calculated based on the location details collected from app

formId.description: Forms unique ID, Which will be used in Custom Forms data API to get the details.

formDescription.example: Enter the delivery details while doing checkout

userId.description: Unique id of the workmate user.

departmentName.description: Name of the Checked in department

contactPersonName.description: Either client or department contact person name

checkinDateTime.description: Date & Time at which user checked in against the client

checkoutDateTime.description: Address of the checked out location

totalHoursSpent.description: Total time spent at the client location. The time differnece between check in to check out.

remarks.description: Comments entered by the user during the check out process.

tags.description: List of selected tags during check in. It indicates the check in purpose.

label.description: Name of the question or title.

clientEmailId.description: Contact person email id of the checked in client or the department

clientMobileNo.description: Contact person mobile number of the checked in client or department

creationTime.description: Time at which this department is being added. EPoch time.

updationTime.description: Time at which this department is being upated last time. It is in Epoch time.

contactPersonName.description: Name of the department contact person
Name of the department contact person

address.example: 1134, Dr SK Karim Khan Road, HAL Stage 2, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka. 0 m from MapmyIndia Bangalore pin-560008 (India)

message.description: Describes the type of error based on the type of response code.
message.example: Mentioned User ID is not belongs to this account
